reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects email addresses, IP addresses, browser details, log files details (such as error codes, files accessed), time zone information, operating system details, cookies (temporary and permanent), and usage details like frequency, duration, and patterns of use.

content: Usage details (time, frequency, duration, patterns of use)

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the privacy policy document that mentions the specifics of the data collected by the app.
reply.reference: Your email address when you elect to remain logged in so as to maintain and recall your preferences within the website... We use the Internet Protocol address, browser type, browser language, referring URL, files accessed, errors generated, time zone, operating system and other visitor details collected in our log files to analyze the trends, administer the website, track visitor's movements and to improve our website... We use temporary and permanent cookies to en... URL: https://charmhealth.com/privacy-policy.html

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that any changes to the Privacy Policy Statement will be communicated to users to inform them of the nature of information collected, manner of collection, use, and sharing of information. Additionally, users are given the ability to opt out of new uses of Personal Information.
reply.reference: Any changes to the Privacy Policy Statement will be posted on our website in order to keep you informed of any changes in nature of information collected, manner of collection, use and sharing of information. If at any point we decide to use Personal Information in a manner different from that stated at the time it was collected, we will notify you by email and provide you with the ability to opt out of these new uses. URL: https://charmhealth.com/privacy-policy.html

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The Privacy Policy states that users will be notified by email and provided with the ability to opt out if their personal information is used in a manner different from the stated collection purpose. Additionally, users have the option to delete data stored on user accounts.

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: No data is shared with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app does not share data with third parties.
reply.reference: MedicalMine never shares your email address with external entities. URL: https://charmhealth.com/privacy-policy.html

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app does not share email addresses with external entities. This implies that email addresses are not shared with any third parties outside the app.
